participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and responsible, Emily loves being organized and enjoys making memories with her children.
participant_1.background: I am a responsible adult who works hard and takes care of my responsibilities. I have two kids I enjoy being on social media. My job is flexible, so I can take care of my health and still be productive. I hate my parents, but I love my job. I love owning nice office supplies.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Jake has a passion for stories and enjoys exploring the outdoors.
participant_2.background: My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida. I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination. I am a childrens librarian. I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia. But, I feel lost and far away from who I truly am.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a childrens librarian. I love my job!
That sounds awesome! I love kids.
Me too! I remember when I was a kid I would pretend to be a dragon trainer at the park with my siblings.
That is so cute! I used to pretend to be a princess.
I love to hike and bike in my new home state of Florida. Do you like to be active?
Yes, I do! I love to go for walks with my kids.
That's great! Being active is important for your health.
Yes, it is. I also like to work out at the gym.
That's great! I have been working on my car in the garage. I am dreaming of going to Australia.
That sounds like fun! I have always wanted to go to Australia.
Maybe we can go together sometime.
